articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Hamilton: Parental involvement in F1 driver career is “thin line to walk” - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says that the close involvement of a parent in the management of a Formula 1 driver’s career is a “thin line to walk”.
articles.content:
Hamilton made the comments ahead of this weekend's Saudi Arabian Grand Prix and in the context of Max Verstappens father, Jos, offering his views on the Christian Horner controversy.
In the wake of … [+3521 chars]
